item.title: Blobble Wars
item.description: Aim your blob-shooting turret and capture the other turrets by turning them green. You win the game when your enemy doesn't occupy any turrets.

item.title: Here To Collect
item.description: Shoot all the zombies that enter the room. Make it far enough to pickup new weapons to blast them! Collect the bounty that the zombies drop.

item.title: Alien Thief
item.description: Aliens have finally discovered Earth, and through all their intrigue, they've decided to gather as much information as they can! Help the aliens ab..

item.title: Cube Me, I Am A Transformer
item.description: Take control of your remarkable shape-shifting powers to make your way through puzzling platform levels!

item.title: Car Chaos
item.description: Stop the cars from crashing in the city with this hot action title. Just click on the cars to make them go faster, slow down or stop.

item.title: Counter Specialist
item.description: There's a war going on and the government needs you to engage in some dangerous tactical espionage! Break into the terrorist's base, take out all o..

item.title: Retro Shoot
item.description: Defeat the waves of Retronaut forces in this easy to play shooter. Shoot, dodge and power-up your way through multiple levels of fast paced action.

item.title: Gemclix
item.description: Smash touching blocks in this supremely beautiful, action packed puzzle game.

item.title: The Lorry Story
item.description: Bring the goods to your destination without dropping any packages. Invest the money you earn on upgrades for your truck.

item.title: Railroad Shunting Puzzle
item.description: This is a fun and challenging railway puzzle, in which the goal is to route locomotives and wagons to their relevant destination in various layouts.

item.title: 3D Quick Pool
item.description: Test your skill and accuracy on a small pool table and pot all your balls into the hole in this challenging mini 3D pool game

item.title: Storm Ops
item.description: Defend your base from superior enemy forces. Use your skills and a range of various weapons and sights to stop the wave-based attack.

item.title: Getaway
item.description: Your fellow criminals have just committed a heist and made away with a ton of loot! It's up to you to get them to their destination safely, but the..

item.title: Papa's Pizzeria
item.description: Help Papa keep his reputation and take care of his famously popular pizzeria whilst his gone! Prepare, cook and dish out delicious pizzas as fast a..

item.title: Jungle Kart Island
item.description: Compete in a crazy kart race around jungle island. Be the first to complete three laps around the circuit, racing against seven other competitors.

item.title: Blazing Assassin
item.description: Fancy yourself as a hot shot assassin? Prove your worth by shooting enough targets to progress.

item.title: Epic Truck 2
item.description: Jump back in your Epic Truck and race through the mountains, creating even more havoc along the way!

item.title: Streets Of Death
item.description: Zombies have taken over the city! You are the last cop alive! Keep the zombies at bay while you make your way to the military base in search of back..

item.title: Basketball Shots
item.description: It's time to hit the court and shoot some hoops. The NBA is knocking on your door but your coach wants you to brush up on your skills. Show him you..

item.title: Supreme Stunts
item.description: Try and wow the crowds with some awesome stunts in order to progress onto the next level of the tournament.
